Header.title: Welcome to my Portfolio Website
Header.paragraph: Hello! I'm Dhaniel Reid, a passionate Software Developer with a drive for creating innovative solutions and impactful designs. With a strong foundation in Computer Science, I strive to deliver high-quality work that meets the unique needs of each project.

About.paragraph: With 7 secondary and 4 tertiary years of experience, I have strengthened my skills in various areas including JSON formatting and HTML mostly among others and am driven by a commitment to excellence and innovation. My journey in my field has been fueled by a deep curiosity and a desire to create solutions that make a difference.
